targets.expr: sum by(redpanda_group) (max by(redpanda_namespace, redpanda_topic, redpanda_partition) (redpanda_kafka_max_offset{instance=~"$redpanda_instance", redpanda_namespace="kafka", redpanda_topic=~"[[redpanda_topic]]"}) - on(redpanda_topic, redpanda_partition) group_right max by(redpanda_group, redpanda_topic, redpanda_partition)(redpanda_kafka_consumer_group_committed_offset{instance=~"$redpanda_instance", redpanda_group=~"[[redpanda_group]]"})+1)

panels.description: The total amount of full restarts of the job in the selected time period

targets.expr: sum(flink_taskmanager_job_task_operator_KafkaConsumer_records_consumed_rate{job=~"$taskmanager_job"}) by ([[by]]) or on([[by]]) sum(rate(flink_taskmanager_job_task_operator_pub_sub_project_PubSubPullMessagesCount{job=~"$taskmanager_job"}[5m])) by ([[by]]) or on([[by]]) sum(flink_taskmanager_job_task_operator_KafkaSourceReader_KafkaConsumer_records_consumed_rate{job=~"$taskmanager_job"}) by ([[by]])  or on([[by]]) sum(rate(flink_taskmanager_job_task_operator_spanner_change_stream_reader_DataRecordCount{job=~"$taskmanager_job"})) by ([[by]])

sum(flink_taskmanager_job_task_operator_KafkaConsumer_records_consumed_rate{job=~"$taskmanager_job"} offset 1d) by ([[by]]) or on([[by]]) sum(rate(flink_taskmanager_job_task_operator_pub_sub_project_PubSubPullMessagesCount{job=~"$taskmanager_job"}[5m] offset 1d)) by ([[by]]) or on([[by]]) sum(flink_taskmanager_job_task_operator_KafkaSourceReader_KafkaConsumer_records_consumed_rate{job=~"$taskmanager_job"} offset 1d) by ([[by]])  or on([[by]]) sum(rate(flink_taskmanager_job_task_operator_spanner_change_stream_reader_DataRecordCount{job=~"$taskmanager_job"}) offset 1d) by ([[by]])

targets.expr: max(avg_over_time(flink_taskmanager_job_task_numRecordsInPerSecond{job=~"$taskmanager_job", task_name=~"$task_name"}[5m])) by (job, task_name) / (min(avg_over_time(flink_taskmanager_job_task_numRecordsInPerSecond{job=~"$taskmanager_job", task_name=~"$task_name"}[5m])) by (job, task_name) + 1)

max(avg_over_time(flink_taskmanager_job_task_numRecordsOutPerSecond{job=~"$taskmanager_job", task_name=~"$task_name"}[5m])) by (job, task_name) / (min(avg_over_time(flink_taskmanager_job_task_numRecordsOutPerSecond{job=~"$taskmanager_job", task_name=~"$task_name"}[5m])) by (job, task_name) + 1)

sum(avg(flink_taskmanager_job_task_operator_state_name_valueStateGetLatency{job=~"$taskmanager_job", quantile="0.99"}) by (job, state_name, kubernetes_pod_name) * sum(rate(flink_taskmanager_job_task_operator_state_name_valueStateGetLatency_count{job=~"$taskmanager_job"}[1m])) by (job, state_name, kubernetes_pod_name)) by (job, state_name) / sum(rate(flink_taskmanager_job_task_operator_state_name_valueStateGetLatency_count{job=~"$taskmanager_job"}[1m])) by (job, state_name)

sum(avg(flink_taskmanager_job_task_operator_state_name_mapStateGetLatency{job=~"$taskmanager_job", quantile="0.99"}) by (job, state_name, kubernetes_pod_name) * sum(rate(flink_taskmanager_job_task_operator_state_name_mapStateGetLatency_count{job=~"$taskmanager_job"}[1m])) by (job, state_name, kubernetes_pod_name)) by (job, state_name) / sum(rate(flink_taskmanager_job_task_operator_state_name_mapStateGetLatency_count{job=~"$taskmanager_job"}[1m])) by (job, state_name)

sum(avg(flink_taskmanager_job_task_operator_state_name_listStateGetLatency{job=~"$taskmanager_job", quantile="0.99"}) by (job, state_name, kubernetes_pod_name) * sum(rate(flink_taskmanager_job_task_operator_state_name_listStateGetLatency_count{job=~"$taskmanager_job"}[1m])) by (job, state_name, kubernetes_pod_name)) by (job, state_name) / sum(rate(flink_taskmanager_job_task_operator_state_name_listStateGetLatency_count{job=~"$taskmanager_job"}[1m])) by (job, state_name)

sum(avg(flink_taskmanager_job_task_operator_state_name_valueStateUpdateLatency{job=~"$taskmanager_job", quantile="0.99"}) by (job, state_name, kubernetes_pod_name) * sum(rate(flink_taskmanager_job_task_operator_state_name_valueStateUpdateLatency_count{job=~"$taskmanager_job"}[1m])) by (job, state_name, kubernetes_pod_name)) by (job, state_name) / sum(rate(flink_taskmanager_job_task_operator_state_name_valueStateUpdateLatency_count{job=~"$taskmanager_job"}[1m])) by (job, state_name)

sum(avg(flink_taskmanager_job_task_operator_state_name_mapStatePutAllLatency{job=~"$taskmanager_job", quantile="0.99"}) by (job, state_name, kubernetes_pod_name) * sum(rate(flink_taskmanager_job_task_operator_state_name_mapStatePutAllLatency_count{job=~"$taskmanager_job"}[1m])) by (job, state_name, kubernetes_pod_name)) by (job, state_name) / sum(rate(flink_taskmanager_job_task_operator_state_name_mapStatePutAllLatency_count{job=~"$taskmanager_job"}[1m])) by (job, state_name)

sum(avg(flink_taskmanager_job_task_operator_state_name_mapStatePutLatency{job=~"$taskmanager_job", quantile="0.99"}) by (job, state_name, kubernetes_pod_name) * sum(rate(flink_taskmanager_job_task_operator_state_name_mapStatePutLatency_count{job=~"$taskmanager_job"}[1m])) by (job, state_name, kubernetes_pod_name)) by (job, state_name) / sum(rate(flink_taskmanager_job_task_operator_state_name_mapStatePutLatency_count{job=~"$taskmanager_job"}[1m])) by (job, state_name)

sum(avg(flink_taskmanager_job_task_operator_state_name_listStateAddLatency{job=~"$taskmanager_job", quantile="0.99"}) by (state_name, kubernetes_pod_name) * sum(rate(flink_taskmanager_job_task_operator_state_name_listStateAddLatency_count{job="$taskmanager_job"}[1m])) by (state_name, kubernetes_pod_name)) by (state_name) / sum(rate(flink_taskmanager_job_task_operator_state_name_listStateAddLatency_count{job="$taskmanager_job"}[1m])) by (state_name)
